title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Decimate Hamas Financier and Terrorist Infrastructures in Focused Operations: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF and Shin Bet attacked and eliminated a terrorist who served as a key financier of Hamas’s military wing in Rafah; IDF soldiers eliminated terrorists in focused operations in the Shuja’iyya neighborhood.

The IDF and Shin Bet eliminated the terrorist Nazzar Yaakov Jawaber Nazzar, who, as part of his activity in the military wing, was involved in financing the central operation of Hamas’ military activity in Rafah, and also transferred hundreds of thousands of dollars in December for military operations.

IDF soldiers in command of the Northern Brigade of the Gaza Division have been operating in recent days in focused operations in the Shuja’iyya area in the north of the Strip, eliminating terrorists and destroying many terrorist infrastructures. In one of the operations, the soldiers raided a post which served as a Hamas terrorist training site. Following the force’s raid on the site, an Air Force aircraft attacked the site and destroyed it.

Attached are images from the force’s operations: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC11042024.156156
